vulnerabilities.title: Insufficient Brute Force Protection
vulnerabilities.description: No account lockout or insufficient rate limiting after multiple failed login attempts
vulnerabilities.impact: Attackers can perform credential brute force attacks
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement account lockout after 3-5 failed attempts and progressive delays

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: Strict-Transport-Security
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add Strict-Transport-Security header with appropriate value

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Rate Limiting
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential DoS attacks and resource abuse
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement rate limiting for resource-intensive endpoints
